text.0: the sacrifice obtains the gods acceptance be graciously inclined to us Ādityas.
text.1: hitherward let your favour be directed and be our best deliverer from trouble.
text.2: by praisesongs of aṅgirases exalted may the gods come to us with their protection.
text.3: may indra with his powers maruts with maruts aditi with Ādityas grant us shelter.
text.4: this laud of ours may varuṇa and indra aryaman agni savitar find pleasant.
text.5: this prayer of ours may varuṇa grant and mitra and aditi and sindhu earth and heaven.
